'''TrueCrypt''' is a [[software application]] used for [[on-the-fly encryption]]. It can create a virtual encrypted disk in a file (container), which can be mounted as if it were a real disk. TrueCrypt also supports device-hosted volumes, which can be created on either an individual [[partition (computing)|partition]] or an entire disk. As of version 5.0, it can encrypt the Windows [[booting|boot]] [[partition]] or entire boot drive.
'''TrueCrypt''' is a [[software application]] used for [[on-the-fly encryption]]. It can create a virtual encrypted disk in a file (container), which can be mounted as if it were a real disk. TrueCrypt also supports device-hosted volumes, which can be created on either an individual [[partition (computing)|partition]] or an entire disk. As of version 5.0, it can encrypt the Windows [[booting|boot]] [[partition]] or entire boot drive.
